manifest.name: @nuxtjs/axios
manifest.description: Secure and easy Axios integration with Nuxt.js

scripts.release: yarn test && standard-version && git push --follow-tags && npm publish

manifest.readme:
[![@nuxtjs/axios](https://axios.nuxtjs.org/preview.png)](https://axios.nuxtjs.org)

# @nuxtjs/axios

[![npm version][npm-version-src]][npm-version-href]
[![npm downloads][npm-downloads-src]][npm-downloads-href]
[![Github Actions CI][github-actions-ci-src]][github-actions-ci-href]
[![Codecov][codecov-src]][codecov-href]
[![License][license-src]][license-href]

> Secure and easy [Axios](https://github.com/axios/axios) integration for [Nuxt](https://nuxtjs.org).

- [âœ¨  Release Notes](https://axios.nuxtjs.org/releases)
- [ðŸ“–  Documentation](https://axios.nuxtjs.org)

## Features

- Automatically set base URL for client & server side
- Exposes `setToken` function to `$axios` so we can easily and globally set authentication tokens
- Automatically enables `withCredentials` when requesting to base URL
- Proxy request headers in SSR
- Fetch Style requests
- Integrated with Nuxt progress bar
- Integrated with Proxy Module
- Auto retry requests with axios-retry

[ðŸ“–  Read more](https://axios.nuxtjs.org)

## Contributing

1. Clone this repository
2. Install dependencies using `yarn install` or `npm install`
3. Start development server using `npm run dev`
